name: Hangman_Game_Flutter
shortDescription: A simple Hangman Game build using Flutter framework. It comes with 2 modes, an easy mode which has 5 lives per turn, and a timer mode with 60 secs of the time limit and 5 lives per turn.
longDescription: A simple Hangman Game build using Flutter framework. It comes with 2 modes, an easy mode which has 5 lives per turn, and a timer mode with 60 secs of the time limit and 5 lives per turn.
